Class Swarm

java.lang.Object
com.github.cowwoc.docker.resource.Swarm
public class Swarm extends Object
A docker swarm (cluster).

  • Method Summary

    String

    Returns the ID of the swarm.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of a node
      Returns:
      null if no match is found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if id is null
